name: Life Care Society
briefDescription: LIfe Care Society has been serving the cause of people-centered, people managed, people-controlled and people-owned development process. It believes that sustainable development and good governance can be ensured only through active and effective involvement of the local communities irrespective of caste, class or gender. It endeavors to empower the people in ways such that they can take their own decisions regarding their progress and build a stable society that is free of social, economic and gender inequalities. Life Care Society is a progressive social organization registered under the Societies Registration Act 1860 and was established on 2nd October 2003 having its Registered Office in Dehradun, Uttarakhand.
